SELECT apilist.API_LIST_ID API_LIST_ID , API_NM , PRV_ORG , API_VIEW , API_EXPL , API_RGDT , API_APPLY_ID , COUNT_API_USES FROM API_LIST apilist LEFT JOIN (SELECT API_LIST_ID , count(*) COUNT_API_USES FROM API_USES GROUP BY API_LIST_ID ) apiuses ON apiuses.API_LIST_ID = apilist.API_LIST_ID WHERE API_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY API_LIST_ID DESC
ORDER BY API_VIEW DESC
